column4: does anyone know of a 'hyper terminal' - like program for linux?
i want to connect via serial port with a robotic device and interpret the signals
very old "dumb terminals" with a small black&white ctr monitor and a funky keyboard attached to it... that thing would connect through serial to a computer..
:  i just want to pick up signals through a usb port
after pluging that stuff.. do a "dmesg" to check if the system detected it...
that's not all, i'll probably see a device name something like: /dev/<somepath>/<somename>
make your weird USB stuff generate data.. with that "cat" on a diferent terminal
i gotta run to radio shack b4 it closes, thanks for your help
